titleInfo.title: 1923 Flood at Harry Harris Coal and Wood Company

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#573 Flood at Harry Harris Coal and Wood Co, 1923 309 Lawrence''. On back of photograph: ''Harry Harris Coal Wood 1923 Flood 309 Lawrence #573 Harry Harris Coal and Wood Co. 1923 Flood''.

mods.abstract: Devastation from the 1923 flood in Denver, Colorado at Harry Harris Coal and Wood Company, 309 Lawrence street, Denver, Colorado.

name.namePart: Harry Harris Coal and Wood Company
